row.col: This article is as few or no other articles link to it. Please help in articles on related topics. (October 2007)''

bdy.p: Constructive induction is a process in the field of machine learning, which can be described as changing the representations of data by creating new attributes from existing ones, and possibly removing old ones. 1 2 3 4 5

reflist.entry: Pazzani, M. (1996). " Constructive induction of Cartesian product attributes". Retrieved on 2007-10-02.

entry.cite: Pfahringer, Bernhard (1994). "Robust Constructive Induction". KI-94: Advances in Artificial Intelligence : 18th German Annual Conference: 118-.

Liu, Huan; Motoda, Hiroshi (1998). Feature Extraction, Construction and Selection: A Data Mining Perspective. Springer. ISBN 0792381963.
Kangassalo, Hannu; Jaakkola, Hannu (1990). Information Modelling and Knowledge Bases. IOS Press. ISBN 9051990367.
